body: The funny thing is, it's just six pages to make some people angry

Wow, lots of butthurt. Hey, like they say, "truth hurt". Even got another "vanilla fag" despite explicitly wanting actual cuckolding stuff or having the profile pic that I have. @MeAndTheBoy, good joke, your number is more of the same, thought for one sec that maybe I missed a good one but no, already read it,  it's netori and just as stupid as the others. But hey, apparently, wanting good porn and not the same low-quality shit is apparently stupid. NTR really is excellent brain rotting material.
@ShrekTheAlpha FAX! Idk how so many people on a hentai site talking about "im here for the story"... we all know what we really came here for...
Alazoth, you wouldn't be bitching about muh story of it was some boring ass 10 page vanilla hentai with "wholesome" sex. Fucking reddit-tier faggot

Oh get the fuck out of here with that story nonsense. I look at hentai manga instead of single images because hentai manga allows for more complex and fluid sex scenes. Instead of one picture, it's many pictures. I don't give a donkey's ass about story when I'm trying to bust a fat fuckin nut.

@mreirsrierm I'm 100% come for quality of story... adding art and sex. Why would you come to doujin if not for story? there's probably millions of cuckold single images on Google image. It not even that hard to make well made story NTR, look at 325479... well excuse dick joke, plenty and logical reason for heroin to change her mind. But no, most of NTR artists just lazy and because they gonna be able to sell their shit anyway since cuck is fine with anything with NTR tag slap on it. Same goes for vanilla doujin... But vanilla have it easy since is just story of a couple anyway...

@mreirsrierm Never read a Tuna Empire? Kuwoira Menou? Nakamura Regura? O.p/com? InCase? The Kite? And there's others. Just to say, I'm not talking about making outstanding storytelling (like The Kite), but when the slightest, actual, effort is made to do a story, it can easily make the whole dozens time better, be it a "feel good" or a "feel bad" story. But hey, that something antithetical to NTR, as you seem all too happy to eat the same lazy shit off the toilet of the artists just to feel special because the only thing NTR do well is endless stupidity and wasting good art on boring shit.

@AlaZoth dude, thats hentai in general. Who else comes to this for “quality” storytelling about sex? Surely all that drives us degenerates is just getting off to a good set of comics. And thats the principle to which we follow.

Might as well type “5 midgets fucking a tree elf in space” for creativity, maybe that will get you off. goodluck

"u can never understand NTR"... What's there to understand? That it's a lazy ass genre made to make try-hard like yourself feel special? As for noob, honestly, it's the NTR that's for noob. once you get past the bullshit, it's as effective as a wet fart against a forest fire. How about some hentai about cuckolding and/or without any bullshit? Maybe even actual bisex MMF hentai? Or a shit ton of stuff that's never been (or barely and/or half-assed) done? Not even talking about the utter lack of creativity the genre and/or tired, overdone shit NTR is that make it the blandest hentai genre once you get past the incredibly cheap shock value that it rest on.
